name: Alena's Tale
description:
"Friendship needs to be more persistent than water" Gameplay

Play with Alena and her companion Telarion, and try to save the village problem about water supply.  Walk around, talk with other characters to unveil more of the story content. Solve puzzles alone and with the help of Telarion. But most of all have fun.

Story

Times of despair reach Emerald Bay and the land they live in. Settled over water Emerald Bay is a medium size village, home of the Klarak. The civilization Klarak is vast and complex, but our friends here in Emerald Bay are simple fishermen that spend their time in peace among nature. The Yatnam are an alien race that live on the planet Krute, far, far away from Earth. Our story narrates the adventure of Alena, a young Yatnan, and her attempt to save her village. 

Emerald Bay has been around for quite some time, it was founded by Alena’s great-great-grandfathers. This village is a little different, it is settled over the waters of Big lake. All the structures, buildings, bridges, squares, are supported by this algae that is extremely strong and only lives in these waters. 

Recently the Lake started to behave quite strangely, and the water that formerly ran abundantly now started to dwindle. The villagers were worried so decided to elect a hero that could solve their problem .

Here is where our story starts.

Features
  • Narrative driven single player experience.
  • Small and fun prototype.
  • Adventure Game
  • Puzzle Platformer
  • Story driven
  • Multiple Characters

Controls
  • Movement - WASD,    Arrows
  • Jump -  W, Space,  Top Arrow
  • Interactions -  E
  • Grab Objects - G
  • Change between Characters - C
  • Call Telarion (Pet) - F
  • Fly - WASD and Arrows
  • Pause - esc

Thank you for playing :)
